title: decodx
author: decodx
content: What happened: Â Fake LUNA Token that is falsely presented as Terra Luna relaunch.There is no such thing as a "Terra Token", certainly not on the BSC network.There is no mention of it on official websites and social media channels.They use a fake ticker: LUNA to confuse potential investors.ANN Thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5399631.0Archive link:  https://ninjastic.space/post/60191382Scammer's Profile:  Â LunaTerra Website link:  noneBSC Smart Contract: https://bscscan.com/address/0xbd27BFd4e3258D368fA8Fe4EB98e350584bA9971#codeCreator Address: https://bscscan.com/address/0x2faaa0261ecd7f286c04b0b5cff3dd89bf0d101fQuote from: LunaTerra on May 21, 2022, 04:58:16 PMğŸš¨ NEW LAUNCHÂ Guys, thank's for your support! We have an update!Â After difficult discussions, we have decided to deploy a new contract. While we are launching on the DEX and there are discussions with Exchanges (Binance and OKX) about the listing of a new contract. Wait for it please!Â Now you can start trading on #PancakeSwap! Â ğŸŒ• THE NEW #LUNA TOKEN IS LISTED ON #PANCAKESWAP! ğŸš€ Â â—ï¸ There is no possibility to increase the emission! Â ğŸŒ› $Token address: 0xbd27BFd4e3258D368fA8Fe4EB98e350584bA9971Â ğŸ¥ Buy on PancakeSwap: 0xbd27BFd4e3258D368fA8Fe4EB98e350584bA9971Â Network: BSC Â Ticker: LUNA Â Total supply: 200,000,000 tokens Â Initial price: $0.00001Â We can build a bright future together! ğŸŒšI have tagged and flagged the LunaTerra account, DT please support.Flag: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2964

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: May 21, 2022, 10:58:19 PMLast edit: May 21, 2022, 11:46:02 PM by albon
comments.body: Thank you for posting this topic,Since what happened to the Luna coin, scammers have become their main goal to exploit this hype to inflict victims who lost their money in investing in the Luna coin under the pretext of compensating their losses after investing in the new (fake) Luna coin. Therefore, everyone should beware before investing and reviewing the contract address for any coin, especially on Pancakeswap.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: With the LUNA crash we are going to see more of such events happening in social media, shady telegram channels and more. It is another example of the nature of scammers in this ecosystem to use running trends to name their own scams and attempt to confuse users who are caught in the chaos.Moreover, tokens on pancakeswap being unregulated this becomes the prime site for scammers to grow their wings.Newbies should stay away from any project naming itself with such. Remember that in crypto money once sent, is gone forever unless the person on the receiving end sends it back. Of course a scammer would not be one if they would do that.Flag supported from my side.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Scammers will consider anything, just so that they can take advantage of the situation. LUNA hype will undoubtedly bring about lots of interest, so it is important that everyone is aware of what is really happening. This scam token has nothing to do with Terra Luna and is in fact nothing but a scam from start to finish. Do not fall for the deceitful actions of these scammers.Quote from: decodx on May 21, 2022, 09:05:55 PMI have tagged and flagged the LunaTerra account, DT please support.Flag: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2964Good finding, decodx. I supported the flag.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: I was added on a telegram channel of these Luna tokens its surprising that a real Luna team will create a token in the Binance chain and there's no announcement either that they are going to create one on Binance on their Twitter account, if you are updated on what's happening in Tera Luna you'll know the truth if anyone falls to this, how ignorant they can are.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on May 21, 2022, 09:05:55 PMI have tagged and flagged the LunaTerra account, DT please support.Flag: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2964Of course something like this should be supported, if necessary add a red warning, for that jerk user.He didn't think how many victims and losses were experienced by investors on the LUNA project, now he wants to take another chance from investors' suffering, that kind of person should not be in this forum.@decodx, you today saved crypto investors/users in general, against the actions of greedy humans like @LunaTerra.
